entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or rain. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Rain or freezing rain beginning near noon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Local rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
